nodes.text: Hilma Kim was a female individual who operated as a pirate during the Galactic Civil War.
Kim was a descendant of Sélima Kim and, with her twin brother Sven, the heir of the familial business. As her brother, she was beautiful, arrogant and ruthless.

A majority of the Sélima Kim members and residents didn't know who she was, regarding her as a mere pirate. She always used the spy network of the base to spot the better business and join the raids with the Bloodthirsty, her starship.
Some in the organization thought that Hilma and her brother could have shared more than a fraternal relationship.
Helma Kim was created by Pierre Zaplotny for the ambiguously canon roleplaying article Sélima Kim: une base pirate which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 60.
